languages.text: "Говорят, восходящие звезды всегда пылают ярче старых". {n}Эрбрегхт едва сдерживает гулкий смешок.{/n} "Указ на передачу данных подписан. Моя команда отправит вам координаты высадки. И да хранит вас Бог-Император еще долгие годы!"

traits.locale_text: "Говорят, восходящие звезды всегда пылают ярче старых". {n}Эрбрегхт едва сдерживает гулкий смешок.{/n} "Указ на передачу данных подписан. Моя команда отправит вам координаты высадки. И да хранит вас Бог-Император еще долгие годы!"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "They do say that rising stars burn brighter than the old." {n}Erbreght can barely contain a booming chuckle.{/n} "The data transfer decree has been signed. My crew will send you the landing coordinates. The God-Emperor's grace shine upon you for many years to come!"

traits.locale_text: "They do say the rising stars burn brighter than the old." {n}Erbreght can barely contain a booming chuckle.{/n} "The data transfer decree has been signed. My crew will send you the landing coordinates. May the God-Emperor look after you for many years to come!"
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "They do say the rising stars burn brighter than the old." {n}Erbreght can barely contain a booming chuckle.{/n} "The data transfer decree has been signed. My crew will send you the landing coordinates. May the God-Emperor look after you for many years to come!"

traits.locale_text: "They do say that rising stars burn brighter than the old." {n}Erbreght can barely contain a booming chuckle.{/n} "The data transfer decree has been signed. My crew will send you the landing coordinates. The God-Emperor's grace shine upon you for many years to come!"
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "They do say that rising stars burn brighter than the old." {n}Erbreght can barely contain a booming chuckle.{/n} "The data transfer decree has been signed. My crew will send you the landing coordinates. The God-Emperor's grace shine upon you for many years to come!"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Ne dit-on pas que les étoiles montantes brillent plus vivement que les autres ? {n}Erbreght fait mine de contenir un ricanement sourd.{/n} Le décret autorisant le transfert des données a été signé. Mon équipage va vous envoyer les coordonnées au sol. Puisse la grâce de l'Empereur-Dieu vous accompagner aujourd'hui et pour les années à venir ! »
languages.original_text: "They do say that rising stars burn brighter than the old." {n}Erbreght can barely contain a booming chuckle.{/n} "The data transfer decree has been signed. My crew will send you the landing coordinates. The God-Emperor's grace shine upon you for many years to come!"

traits.locale_text: « Ne dit-on pas que les étoiles montantes brillent plus vivement que les autres ? {n}Erbreght fait mine de contenir un ricanement sourd.{/n} Le décret autorisant le transfert des données a été signé. Mon équipage va vous envoyer les coordonnées au sol. Puisse la grâce de l'Empereur-Dieu vous accompagner aujourd'hui et pour les années à venir ! »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “难怪大家都说，新星比旧星更加耀眼。”{n}埃尔布雷特几乎抑制不住自己轰鸣般的笑声。{/n}“数据传输法令已经签署，我的船员会把着陆坐标发给您。愿神皇的恩典将在未来的岁月里永远照耀着您！”
languages.original_text: "They do say that rising stars burn brighter than the old." {n}Erbreght can barely contain a booming chuckle.{/n} "The data transfer decree has been signed. My crew will send you the landing coordinates. The God-Emperor's grace shine upon you for many years to come!"

traits.locale_text: “难怪大家都说，新星比旧星更加耀眼。”{n}埃尔布雷特几乎抑制不住自己轰鸣般的笑声。{/n}“数据传输法令已经签署，我的船员会把着陆坐标发给您。愿神皇的恩典将在未来的岁月里永远照耀着您！”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Man sagt, dass aufstrebende Sterne heller strahlen als alte." {n}Erbreght kann ein dröhnendes Lachen kaum unterdrücken.{/n} "Das Dekret über den Datentransfer wurde unterzeichnet. Meine Crew schickt Euch die Koordinaten für die Landung. Möge die Gnade des Gottimperators noch viele Jahre lang auf Euch hinabscheinen!"
languages.original_text: "They do say that rising stars burn brighter than the old." {n}Erbreght can barely contain a booming chuckle.{/n} "The data transfer decree has been signed. My crew will send you the landing coordinates. The God-Emperor's grace shine upon you for many years to come!"

traits.locale_text: "Man sagt, dass aufstrebende Sterne heller strahlen als alte." {n}Erbreght kann ein dröhnendes Lachen kaum unterdrücken.{/n} "Das Dekret über den Datentransfer wurde unterzeichnet. Meine Crew schickt Euch die Koordinaten für die Landung. Möge die Gnade des Gottimperators noch viele Jahre lang auf Euch hinabscheinen!"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Dicen que las estrellas en ascenso brillan más que las antiguas». {n}Erbreght apenas puede contener una risa retumbante.{/n} «Se ha firmado el decreto de transferencia de datos. Mi personal {mf|lo|la} llevará a las coordenadas de aterrizaje. ¡Que el Dios Emperador {mf|lo|la} tenga en su gracia por muchos años!».
languages.original_text: "They do say that rising stars burn brighter than the old." {n}Erbreght can barely contain a booming chuckle.{/n} "The data transfer decree has been signed. My crew will send you the landing coordinates. The God-Emperor's grace shine upon you for many years to come!"

traits.locale_text: «Dicen que las estrellas en ascenso brillan más que las antiguas». {n}Erbreght apenas puede contener una risa retumbante.{/n} «Se ha firmado el decreto de transferencia de datos. Mi personal {mf|lo|la} llevará a las coordenadas de aterrizaje. ¡Que el Dios Emperador {mf|lo|la} tenga en su gracia por muchos años!».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「若手は古参よりも輝きが強いという言葉の通りだな」{n}エルブレートは吹き出しそうになるのを堪えた。{/n}「データ転送令は署名された。私のクルーが着陸座標を送る。神帝陛下の恩寵がいつまでもあなたに輝くように！」
languages.original_text: "They do say that rising stars burn brighter than the old." {n}Erbreght can barely contain a booming chuckle.{/n} "The data transfer decree has been signed. My crew will send you the landing coordinates. The God-Emperor's grace shine upon you for many years to come!"

traits.locale_text: 「若手は古参よりも輝きが強いという言葉の通りだな」{n}エルブレートは吹き出しそうになるのを堪えた。{/n}「データ転送令は署名された。私のクルーが着陸座標を送る。神帝陛下の恩寵がいつまでもあなたに輝くように！」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Yıldız gençken daha çok parlarmış." {n}Erbreght, kahkahayı basmamak için kendini güçlükle tutuyor.{/n} "Veri iletim fermanı imzalandı. Mürettebatım iniş yerinin koordinatlarını size gönderecektir. Tanrı İmparator'un lütfu, nice yıllar boyu sizinle olsun!"
languages.original_text: "They do say that rising stars burn brighter than the old." {n}Erbreght can barely contain a booming chuckle.{/n} "The data transfer decree has been signed. My crew will send you the landing coordinates. The God-Emperor's grace shine upon you for many years to come!"
